name: Sync (Jan Marcano)
description:
Interactive art game about tuning to an ideal. 

How to play: Try to tune in to the signals, the closer you move to the origin, the less noise you'll hear and the louder the signal will sound. Once you find the origin, another signal will start emitting on top of the previous one until you finish the level.

Headphones and medium English language listening skills suggested.

Takes 10-20mins to complete.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018 by Jan Marcano, Alejo Diaz & Orlando Vargas

Please report if any of the builds don't work as I don't have much means to test  on other OS's than Windows :)
